thread.section_title: Walker Hotel Greenwich Village - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: So many things to love about this hotel!
thread.title_full: So many things to love about this hotel! - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kathleen M
title: So many things to love about this hotel!
text: I've stayed at this hotel twice in the past month, and both times have found it to be ideal for my needs. The lobby, restaurant, and rooms are all attractively decorated. The level of service is friendly, efficient, and prompt. The room was comfortable, with a number of nice pluses such as complimentary bottled water, free wifi that works well, nice robes and slippers, nice bathroom amenities, and turn-down service with a complimentary sweet. The location is great as well - within a block or two of two subway lines, around the corner from a great bagel place, and in an attractive and safe part of town. I'm glad I found this hotel, and I will definitely be going back.
